name: Champa
startIntroPart1: Blessings to you, noble Po Klaung Garai, guardian of the towers of Champa! From the central coasts of ancient Vietnam, your people thrived upon the sea, blessed with faith and fragrant sandalwood. The Kingdom of Champa stood as a bulwark of Hindu and later Buddhist devotion, defending its lands against powerful neighbors and leaving behind towering sanctuaries of piety and art.
startIntroPart2: Now, great King, may your faith once again inspire the hearts of your people. Will you bring prosperity to your coast, and build a civilization to stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You defile our sacred land. Prepare for divine retribution.
attacked: The gods shall judge you for this offense.
defeated: The temples fall silent... but our faith will endure.
introduction: We are the heirs of towers and tides. Will you walk in peace, or provoke the storm?
neutralHello: Peace to you, stranger of distant shores.
hateHello: Your scent offends the spirits. Why do you come?
tradeRequest: A trade in faith and fragrance, perhaps?
uniques: [+1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [{Coast}] tiles>
[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [{Coast}] tiles>

name: Kushan Empire
startIntroPart1: Greetings, Kanishka the Great, mighty sovereign of the Kushan Empire, uniter of the Yuezhi and patron of prosperity and piety! From the windswept steppes of Central Asia to the fertile plains of the Indus, your enlightened rule brought not only trade and conquest, but a golden age of scholarship and cultural fusion. Under your reign, Buddhism flourished and science traveled the length of the Silk Road, bridging worlds and wisdoms.
startIntroPart2: Will you once more raise your banners across the crossroads of civilization? Will your empire again lead the way in commerce, culture, and discovery, and shine brightly as the beacon of enlightenment through the ages?
declaringWar: You have blocked the path of trade and wisdom. Prepare to be swept aside.
attacked: Your aggression insults the harmony we built. We will respond with precision and might.
defeated: The caravans have stopped. The scrolls lie scattered. But knowledge never truly dies.
denounced: Your path leads only to ruin. We will have no part in it.
introduction: Welcome, traveler of distant realms. I am Kanishka, guardian of the trade routes and patron of the learned.
neutralHello: The Silk Road welcomes many, so long as they come in peace.
hateHello: You bring nothing but ignorance and strife.
tradeRequest: Let us share our goods, our ideas, and the benefits of wisdom.

name: Baekje
startIntroPart1: Hail King Muryeong of Baekje, sovereign of a kingdom of beauty, scholarship, and spirit! Nestled in the southern realms of the Korean Peninsula, Baekje thrived as a cultural beacon during the Three Kingdoms era, fostering trade, faith, and enlightenment. Baekje's artisans shaped masterpieces, its monks spread Buddhism to foreign lands, and its scholars elevated Korean civilization to new heights.
startIntroPart2: Will you lead Baekje to a new golden age? Will your plantations blossom into centers of culture, and your elite warriors defend your glory? Let the light of Baekje shine again across the ages!
declaringWar: Baekje does not fear battle. Prepare yourself.
attacked: You strike first? Baekje will not forget this.
defeated: Though we fall, Baekje’s legacy endures.
introduction: Greetings. I am King Muryeong of Baekje, guardian of wisdom and culture.
hateHello: Do not mistake our peace for weakness.
tradeRequest: Let us share the wealth of our kingdoms.

name: Majapahit
startIntroPart1: Great King Hayam Wuruk, ruler of the Majapahit Empire, you presided over a golden age of culture, trade, and diplomacy across the seas of Southeast Asia...
startIntroPart2: Will you extend your influence across the waves once more, forging bonds with distant city-states and mastering the seas?
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>

name: Ainu
startIntroPart1: You lead the Ainu people, the indigenous guardians of the northern forests and coasts. With deep reverence for nature, you thrive in harmony with your environment.
startIntroPart2: Through respect for the wild and the spirits of the forest, your culture flourishes. Will you ensure the survival and honor of your people through peaceful prosperity?
declaringWar: The forest stands with us! Let none desecrate our lands unchallenged.
attacked: Your aggression will awaken the spirits of the wild!
defeated: Though defeated, the forest endures and our spirit remains unbroken.
denounced: Your words are like the cold wind—harsh but empty.
introduction: I am the Ainu Chieftain, protector of forest and sea.
tradeRequest: Let us exchange gifts and strengthen our bonds.
neutralHello: May the spirits of the forest watch over you.
hateHello: You tread where you are not welcome.
